casebody.data:
VAN ALLEN, Respondent, v. MANHATTAN EL. R. CO., Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County,

General Term.

May 8, 1893.) Action by George W. Van Allen against the Manhattan Elevated Railroad Company.

Argued before DALY, C. J., and BOOKSTAVER. J.

Davies & Rapallo, for appellant. Wolff & Hodge, for respondent.

No opinion. Motion to affirm order appealed from, no one appearing for appellant. Motion granted, with costs. See 22 N. Y. Supp. 704.
